channel.title: [wip] userbargenerator redesign!
channel.description:
Hey Guys!
I'm not really very active on here anymore.. but meh!
I've posted a more or less identical post in the Graphics section so I can gain feedback on the actual design. Here I'm looking for feedback as the project from the Web side of things ;)
Basically, over the last month or so I've been developing my site 'UserbarGenerator.com'. It's a one click script which automatically generates stunning userbars absolutely free. When I was designing the site, I focused more on the script than the aesthetics, and now it's time to turn that around!
During the revamp so far, I've developed two versions.. Firstly V1, which can be displayed [url=http://"http://i36.tinypic.com/2u8jcdk.png"]here[/url]! And secondly V2, which is the most recent. You can view that below!
[img]http://i38.tinypic.com/260c03k.jpg[/img]
Basically what I'd like you to do, is give me advice & feedback on the layout as I progress. Give me comments on what you like and dislike, and pay special attention to the improvements made over each update!
Thanks! -[url=http://"http://www.jamesy.net"]James[/url]

item.title: [wip] userbargenerator redesign!
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:2, topic:231473”]The design you have on the website currently is good.

And I’m surprised no one bought that domain before :O[/quote]

I’m glad you think so! But really, it’s just a temp. It’s easy to use and all, but I guess I’ve never been one to settle for something which doesn’t look awesomee. haha.

About the domain, I bought it from a friend of mine. He’s has it for years, but hasn’t had the time or effort to use it

Read full topic
